sense.name: to work together, engage
sense.examples: When ego and power mesh, that is a powerful thing. The times when foes mesh against a common enemy are rare. The gears of the clock meshed together perfectly. The team meshed expertly from years of working together.

sense.name: to catch as in a net
sense.examples: The fisherman meshed as many fish as possible. The coworkers were meshed in a tangled web of lies and deciet. Espionage meshes together players from every side.
